title: Suggestion to completely Redo Reporting.

embed.description: Facebook Page! ▻ https://www.facebook.com/eroticdiscoheat SNAPCHAT ▻ THEDISCOHEAT STREAM ▻ http://www.twitch.tv/discoheat Interact with me on Twitter! ▻ https://twitter.com/thediscoheat...

body:
Hello League of legends Community,

I am posting this as i am extremely unhappy with the current reporting system as it can be exploited and/or ignored very easily.

The current report system is next to useless, as the majority of it's uses are by butthurt and/or enraged players, there are very little in the way of actual, constructive reports.

As an example of the Report system being neglected.

Say there was a Intentional Feeder on your team, and he's feeding every single lane, and just has just bought boots of mobility, so he can get to the enemy faster, so he can more quickly die to them. You, and maybe, maybe one other person on your teams wants to report him, but the rest of your team just leaves Post-game lobby annoyed.

Then comes the enemy team, they wouldn't report the feeder, as they would of loved the extra xp and gold the feeder provided, infact, they'd be more inclined to honour him then to report him.

Recently I've seen a video from teaH ocsiD, in which, a enemy morgana players, recognised there was a troll on her enemy team, and the trolls team wants her team to report him, but she replies with "why thats good for us tho" in chat. This further points out the painfully obvious flaw in the system.

People just don't use the system when it's needed, and use it out of rage, and trolling.

I seriously think riot needs to come up with some other form of moderation of the League of Legends Community.

Thank you for reading this, and i hope that you feel the same way as i do when it comes to this issue.
